entries.text: Added metrics for observer sync time.
Introduced the fault injection framework Byteman for ZooKeeper.
Added an option to zkCli to wait for connection before executing commands.
Enabled the configuration of the early TLS connection drop feature.
Avoided NPE during metrics execution when the leader is not set on a FOLLOWER node.
Enabled the ZooKeeperServerController to expire sessions.
Reduced the performance impact of Prometheus metrics.
Fixed a bug where QuorumPeer overrides Thread.getId() with different semantics.
Fixed an issue where the ZK CLI quit command always logged errors.
Avoided reverse DNS lookup for hostname verification when hostnames are provided in the connection URL.
Fixed a bug so that exists() method now checks for read ACL permissions.
